verbose_text: We previously reported that augmented LUBAC ligase activity is involved in the pathogenesis of the activated B cell like type of diffuse large B cell lymphoma (ABC-DLBCL) and that inhibition of the HOIP / HOIL-1L interaction by a hydrocarbon stapled a-helical peptide (HOIP-N) can suppress the proliferation of ABC-DLBCL cells.
evidence: HOIP/HOIL-1L interaction by a hydrocarbon-stapled a-helical peptide (HOIP-N) can suppress the proliferation
